default.test: npm run test:lint && npm run test:unit
default.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post

buildProcess.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build

rollup.build:rollup: babel lib --out-dir dist/ && BABEL_ENV=rollup rollup -c rollup.config.js

tsRollup.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:rollup
